author: pipermerriam
content:
just a starting off point but I wrote a few things down trying to capture what we're doing at a high level: https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/pull/57/files

I'll probably let that sit for a day or two before merging after which expanding out some of those TODO elements will take focus.
